Introduction

Gon is a South Korean singer-songwriter under KLAP Entertainment. He is the main rapper and main dancer of the boy group VANNER.

KLAP Entertainment:
May 4, 2023-present

Feb 14, 2019-May 1, 2023

Fun facts

1
His specialty is freestyle dance.
…
2
Gon has reptiles as pets. His Snake named "Mumu" even appeared in one of the group's music videos.
…
3
Gon loves Scuba Diving and playing Baseball.
…
4
Gon used the be the group's dance trainer until the company asked him if he wanted to be in the group.
